Name: March 25 Newsletter
Post:
March at Stonebridge: Celebrations, New Faces, and Exciting Events!

As spring approaches, Stonebridge is blooming with activity! This month brings a wonderful mix of cultural celebrations, community outings, and special gatherings designed to engage, entertain, and create meaningful connections among our residents and families.

Welcoming Our New Culinary Talent

We are beyond thrilled to welcome our new sous chef, Victor, to the Stonebridge Community!

Coming to us from our sister property in Littleton, Victor brings not only exceptional culinary talent but also an infectious personality that lights up the kitchen. His passion for creating flavorful, high-quality dishes is matched by his openness to feedback and dedication to delivering the best dining experience for our community.

We can't wait for you to experience his incredible cooking and warm, welcoming spiritâ€”welcome to the team, Victor!

March Events Calendar

Our calendar is packed with exciting events this month:

  • March 4: Mardi Gras Social - Laissez les bons temps rouler! Join us for festive decorations, traditional New Orleans music, and delicious Cajun-inspired treats.
  • March 8: International Women's Day Tea Party - Celebrate the amazing women in our community with an elegant afternoon tea featuring delightful refreshments and meaningful conversation.
  • March 13: Denver Aquarium Outing - Explore the wonders of the deep at the Downtown Aquarium with fellow residents on this special outing.
  • March 17: St. Patrick's Day "Pub Crawl" and "A Taste of Ireland" - Don your green and join us for a festive "pub crawl" around our community, followed by a special Irish-themed dinner.
  • March 19: Blackhawk Outing with Golden Pond - Try your luck and enjoy a day trip to Blackhawk with our friends from Golden Pond community.
  • March 27: Denver Zoo Outing - Experience the wildlife and wonders of the Denver Zoo on this specially planned excursion.
  • March 28: Dementia Support Group (4:00 PM) - Join our first meeting led by Regional Memory Care Director Marci Gerke, designed for anyone caring for an aging loved one, especially those with dementia.

Friday Happy Hours

Kick off the weekend with us at Friday Happy Hour!

Every Friday at 2:00 PM, we invite residents and guests to enjoy delicious bites, refreshing drinks, and live music in a fun and relaxing atmosphere. It's the perfect opportunity to unwind, mingle, and start your weekend on a high note!

Employee of the Month: Sabrina Arevalo-Jimenez

We are thrilled to celebrate Sabrina Arevalo-Jimenez as our Employee of the Month! Sabrina's heart of gold and dedication make a difference every day. She goes above and beyond for our residents, bringing warmth, care, and positivity to everyone around her.

A true team player, Sabrina's kindness and commitment make our community feel like home. Thank you, Sabrina, for all that you do! Let's give her a well-deserved round of applause.

March Birthday Celebrations

This month, we're celebrating these wonderful residents on their special days:

March 5

Richard B.

March 6

Jerome B.

March 7

Betsy W.

March 20

Alice S.

March 23

Judy Y.

Happy Birthday to all our March-born residents! We look forward to celebrating each of you.

New Dementia Support Group

We're proud to announce the launch of our Dementia Support Group, with our first meeting on March 28th at 4:00 PM. Led by Regional Memory Care Director Marci Gerke, this group is open to anyone caring for an aging loved one, especially those with dementia.

This supportive environment offers the chance to connect with others on similar journeys, gain valuable information, and share experiences in an understanding atmosphere. Whether you're a family member of a resident or a community member seeking support, you're welcome to join us.
